request.description:
- 401 / Unathorised - JWT token is missing or invalid
- 403 / Forbidden - User doesn't have required permissions
- 404 / Not Found - URL not found
- 422 / Unprocessable Entity - Not enough data for request (or invalid)
Notification has "isRead" status. API request toggle this status.
Simple ping request. Doesn't need Authorization header.
Simple ping request. Requires Authorization header.

response.name: Success

header.value: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

request.description: Temporary token for authentication. Secret token between client and server. Random string.
Authorization header has a persistent token in each request. JWT token.
Simple verification of JWT persistent token.
